name: Climb of Destiny
description:
Climb the mountain because it is your destiny.  You must climb the  mountain while dodging enemies but don't get hit! If you die you start back over at the shop below headed by the best boy. The  journey doesn't end here, buy items to get power ups to climb the mountain faster.

Credits

Duncan Fu - Producer/Artist

Kiana Burnett - Art & Animation

Mason Do - Audio/SFX

Benjamin Wong - Programmer 

Shane Parslow - Programmer

Hunter Drummond - Programmer/Designer
